Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] GPM VGU 2022: Global Production Management VL

Messages.Author: Holger Kohl
Messages.Content: Dear Students, as promosed, you will find on the ISIS-Platform a lecture about the extra "Extra Topic: Investment and Costing". The topic is not relevant for the final exam this week. But a few students wanted now a bit more in the area of finacial planning of investments. Enjoy this extra lecture. BR Prof. Dr. Holger Kohl

Messages.Author: Valentin Eingartner
Messages.Content: Dear students,  as announced earlier today, we had to adjust the lecture date for the lecture on Monday.  The lecture will be moved to Tuesday, April 23., so you will have two lectures on GPM, one 10-12am and one 12-14pm. Both will be held in PWZ2, the room downstairs in the test field.  Best regards, Valentin Eingartner

Messages.Author: Holger Kohl
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I just uploaded the next video lectures 9, 10, and 11. Enjoy watching the videos and see you next week. BR Prof. Dr.-Ing. Holger Kohl

Messages.Author: Holger Kohl
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I just uploaded the next video lectures 6,7, and 8. You will see that I changed the topic of lecture 7 from factory planning to Production Control. I am qiute sure that this topic is more relevant. The next lectures will be uploaded over the next weekend. Enjoy watching the videos. BR Prof. Dr.-Ing. Holger Kohl

Messages.Author: Holger Kohl
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I just uploaded the first three video lectures. The next video lectures will be uploaded over the next weekend. Enjoy wathching the videos and please also have a look at the addition material. With Best Ragards Prof. Dr. Holger Kohl
